channel.title: Need Help With Complier
channel.description:

item.title: Need Help With Complier
item.dc:creator: @Patrick1 Patrick_
item.description:
@Patrick1 wrote:

What extension is your Client? Is it .txt or .java?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Complier
item.dc:creator: @runescapepkserver runescapepkserver
item.description:
@runescapepkserver wrote:

I only have a client which is a notepad document… and a .class

add me on MSN PLEASEEEEEEE

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Complier
item.dc:creator: @runescapepkserver runescapepkserver
item.description:
@runescapepkserver wrote:

All i have is client, which is a notepad document. And a client.class.

Can you add me on MSN possibly? It will save us both time
swartypants37@hotmail.com

item.title: Need Help With Complier
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

not in the compiler, in your client.java.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Complier
item.dc:creator: @runescapepkserver runescapepkserver
item.description:
@runescapepkserver wrote:

@echo off
color 0a
title Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished !
pause
exit

Thats in my compiler, what should i change?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With Complier
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

you most likely forgot a { or }

Read full topic
